name: jekyll-bootstrap-4-browserify-boilerplate
description: Starter boilerplate project for Jekyll with Bootstrap 4 and Browserify.

scripts.js:build:dev: npm run js:lint && npm run js:clean && npm run js:browserify
scripts.js:build: npm run js:build:dev && npm run js:min-uglify
scripts.css:build: npm run css:getbootstrap && npm run css:clean && npm run css:sass
scripts.css:watch: nodemon --ext scss --watch ./_source/scss --exec 'npm run css:lint && npm run css:build'
scripts.watch: npm run js:watch & npm run css:watch
scripts.build: npm run js:build && npm run css:build

author: Sergey Sokurenko
